message: +1. Actually, I would rather have the option (like facebook) to get notifications on a topic in a group that I comment on. I don't need to hear all the chatter in all the topics if I'm not interested, and I should have an easy way (like commenting) to subscribe to a topic. I can also just "star" it or something so I get the responses to a topic but the entire group! That's too much
See https://convore.com/feedback/topic-muting/ =) (I also neglected to find that topic and posted my own feature request last night...)
I disagree with penguinone, I want topics to be opt out.  Otherwise if you're in a high activity group, you won't see new topics.  But I would like the ability to mute/ignore certain topics.
